Welcome to our WordPress blog! This is the first post where we explore the fundamentals of WordPress blogging.

WordPress makes it easy to publish content, manage media, and engage with your audience. Whether you\'re a blogger, business owner, or content creator, WordPress provides all the tools you need.

Key features include:

  • Easy-to-use editor
  • Built-in SEO optimization
  • Responsive design
  • Extensive plugin ecosystem

Stay tuned for more articles!

In this post, we dive deeper into advanced WordPress techniques and best practices.

Whether you\'re customizing themes, developing plugins, or optimizing performance, understanding these concepts will help you build better WordPress sites.

Topics covered:

  1. Custom post types and taxonomies
  2. API integration
  3. Performance optimization
  4. Security hardening

Each of these areas offers powerful capabilities for extending WordPress functionality.

' --post_status=publish --post_author=1

wp post create --post_type=post --post_title='Third Post: WordPress Community and Resources' --post_content='

The WordPress community is one of the largest open-source communities in the world.

Whether you need help, want to learn new skills, or contribute to the project, there are countless resources available:

  • WordPress.org - Official documentation and support
  • WordPress.com - Hosted WordPress blogs
  • Local WordPress Communities - Meetups and WordCamps
  • Online Courses - Learning platforms with WordPress content

Don\'t hesitate to reach out to the community. We\'re all here to help each other succeed!

' --post_status=publish --post_author=1

<?php
require_once '/wordpress/wp-load.php';

// Function to download and attach featured image
function set_post_featured_image($post_id, $image_url) {
  require_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/image.php');
  require_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/file.php');
  require_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/media.php');
  
  $tmp = download_url($image_url);
  if (is_wp_error($tmp)) return false;
  
  $file_array = array(
    'name' => basename($image_url),
    'tmp_name' => $tmp
  );
  
  $attachment_id = media_handle_sideload($file_array, $post_id);
  if (!is_wp_error($attachment_id)) {
    set_post_thumbnail($post_id, $attachment_id);
    return true;
  }
  return false;
}

// Add featured images to posts
$posts = get_posts(array('numberposts' => 3, 'post_type' => 'post'));

if (count($posts) >= 1) {
  set_post_featured_image($posts[0]->ID, 'https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=1');
}
if (count($posts) >= 2) {
  set_post_featured_image($posts[1]->ID, 'https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=2');
}
if (count($posts) >= 3) {
  set_post_featured_image($posts[2]->ID, 'https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=3');
}
?>
